body_html: no, it doesn't support that, but it's mostly because i added size checks that input == output size. Once I remove those checks, the code itself is general enough to have a grid that's of a different size than input.

body: no, it doesn't support that, but it's mostly because i added size checks that input == output size. Once I remove those checks, the code itself is general enough to have a grid that's of a different size than input.
